title: PARTS TO BE DISCARDED
question: What is the proper procedure for disposing of parts listed in Section 6-6 to prevent their reuse?

Discard all parts listed in Section 6-6, "100% Replacement Parts" in such a manner they will

Care must be taken in removing gaskets from aluminum parts. Such removal should be

100 PERCENT(%) REPLACEMENT PARTS.
At assembly, during maintenance, preventive maintenance and engine or component
overhaul replace all gaskets, seals, packings, hoses, "O" rings, cotter pins, retaining rings
(snap rings), safety wire, self locking fasteners (including exhaust manifold nuts) and lock
washers with new parts .
